topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54729d226368724b983d0200#post_54729d226368724b983d0200
[bq="EHAN"]"@Miyo":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547293b963687229549e0000#post_547293b963687229549e0000
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54729cb06368722454480000#post_54729cb06368722454480000
He said some mushy stuff like "I'm so impressed by how far we've come" and stuff like that[/bq]
D'awwww.
You know what; I'm going to subscribe to him, even though I rarely watch his stuff, cause someone that nice deserves the viewership they get.




Side note: oh fucking christ: do you ever just hear someone's opinions on something and go "how the fuck do you even function in a everyday situation?"

If you're wondering how my coffee got metaphorically pissed in short explanation someone was trying to argue that things they disagreed with were literally illegal.  Seriously; how does this person function?  Do they call the police every time someone likes a movie they don't like or something?  I'm legitimately interested in how they function in everyday tasks.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"what celestial body is no longer considered a planet?"

pickles: oooh, thats a tuff question

nathan: what kind of stupid question is that?

murderface: is it the sun?

nathan: it could be anything

pickles: the answer is the earth, the earth is no longer considered a planet


i love this show
